name: SHREE AKSHARA FOUNDATION
briefDescription: SHREE AKSHARA FOUNDATION HAD BEEN WORKING IN HAVERI DISTRICT SINCE FROM THREE YEARS FOR HAVING THE CONCERN FOR THE SOCIETY AND HELPING TO ENCOURAGE CHILDREN EDUCATION. IT IS GIVING FREE COMPUTER EDUCATION FOR RURAL AND URBAN STUDENTS.THIS FOUNDATION IS RUNNING OLD AGE HOME WITH 33 AGED MEN AND WOMEN AND ORPHANAGE HOME AS WELL.THIS FOUNDATION IS WORKING ON THE SOCIAL SERVICE ISSUES,TECHNICAL SUBJECTS,AGRICULTURE AND ALL KINDS OF INNOVATIVE TRAINING AND WORKSHOPS.THE FOUNDATION IS WORKING ON AWARENESS REGARDING PLANTS ,ANIMALS PROTECTION AND IMPROVE UNDERGROUND WATER.
